pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, February 1, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of France, Emmanuel Macron.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting virtually.

Closed to media

The Prime Minister will speak with the co-chair of the COVID-19 Immunity Task Force, Dr. David Naylor.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Chief Science Advisor of Canada, Dr. Mona Nemer.

Media appearance:

9:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on OMNI News Mandarin Edition and Cantonese Edition.
